name: PlayBack (Shot out games) (Shot out games)
description:
• 2.5D side scrolling shooter with a twist
  • Escape the facility by avoiding and deactivating robots by jumping with Space Bar and shooting with Left Mouse Button
  • Press Right Mouse Button to use Reverse Power to rewind the robots shot
  • Press X to freeze and reverse enemy movements
  • Keep an eye on your Reverse Bar level at all times to not lose your special ability
  • Slowly regain your powers and plan your next move
  • Reverse shots are a much easier way to destroy your opponents
  • Reverse the Invincible Final Boss shots to destroy the final obstacle to your escape (Bug where many times it will open by itself)
  • This game was submitted fairly incomplete with several issues (See comments)
  • Didn't get to create any true platform levels
  • Gamepad Combatible
